Key Match Events: Paul George suffered a hyperextension in his left knee during the second quarter of a preseason game against the Atlanta Hawks.
Pre-Game Insights: The 76ers' coach, Nick Nurse, expressed hope that George will recover soon, saying: 'Hopefully, he'll be okay, so he'll be back with us right away.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 76ers are being cautious with Embiid, who is coming off a season in which he played only 39 games due to issues with his left knee.
Others: Daryl Morey, the President of Basketball Operations for the 76ers, had previously warned that both George and Embiid will not play many consecutive games this season, if they play at all.
